channel.title: Trying to save as the right X-shift Y-shift width-2 height-2
channel.description: look it wont save as the right: X-shift Y-shift width-2 height-2 it wont save it, and thats why it feils ingame any suggestions?

item.title: Trying to save as the right X-shift Y-shift width-2 height-2
item.dc:creator: @snoopy89 snoopy89
item.description:
@snoopy89 wrote:

[quote=“Godandjesus, post:9, topic:278388”][quote author=snoopy89 link=topic=367403.msg2784113#msg2784113 date=1242368227]

The sprite editor saves new states when you click refresh.

For replacing multiple sprites: http://rafb.net/p/5rQq0M23.html
Figure out how to use it on your own.

Big thanks Peter, really appreciate it.

EDIT:

Why is this now happing

How to fix the overgrowns halmet?
[/quote]
Are you sure you press “refresh” before you save sprite?[/quote]

Yes, checked 2 times to be sure.

Did it this way!
Took one .spr toke a prt-Scr to be sure that i add the right stuff.
Did this will all the 15 aminated .spr just to be sure i did nothing wrong but still it is so overgrown.
There has to be something i can do:/

Read full topic

Big thanks Peter, really appreciate it.

EDIT:

Why is this now happing

How to fix the overgrowns halmet?[/quote]
Are you sure you press “refresh” before you save sprite?

item.dc:creator: @snoopy89 snoopy89
item.description:
@snoopy89 wrote:

[quote=“yong min, post:5, topic:278388”][quote author=adu link=topic=367403.msg2783595#msg2783595 date=1242333500]
Is it time yet yong? lol
[/quote]

Yes, I guess so

Go for it, Adam ^^

[edit] @snoopy, change:

private boolean requiresShift  = true/false;
private int xShift = 0;
private int yShift = 0;
private int width2 = 0;
private int height2 = 0;

Or just wait for adu to make a release :P[/quote]

I cant make this with every sprites:O got like the whole amination:/
